commented_code:
You should be able to sign-in to GitHub Copilot by clicking on the Copilot icon in the status bar and following the setup instructions.
 
+### Using GitHub Copilot Enterprise {#github-copilot-enterprise}

discussion_comments.comment_body: We should also link the user from agent docs of copilot to here for enterprise users looking for setup. Currently the problem is copilot is spread across two places and both agent/inline completion depend upon this for setting the enterprise so it will be better have  some link from agent docs to here. Other than that this looks good.
I added the link in ai/configuration.md under github-copilot-chat, is that good? Thanks for your feedback!

commented_code:
```sh
   brew install livekit foreman
   ```

+- Follow the steps in the [collab README](../../../crates/collab/README.md) to configure the Postgres database for integration tests

discussion_comments.commented_code:

discussion_comments.comment_body:
We can't use relative links like this in the docs, as they will break when deployed to zed.dev/docs.

This needs to be an absolute URL to GitHub.

discussion_comments.commented_code:
